rawReasoning: Breaking the ad into five scenes balances introduction, feature showcase, and call-to-action within 25 seconds. Scene 1 (3s) grabs attention with the app name; Scene 2 (6s) demonstrates the core swipe interaction; Scene 3 (6s) highlights AI-powered scanning; Scene 4 (5s) shows batch deletion and freed storage; Scene 5 (5s) delivers the launch message and call-to-action.

planData.intent: Create a 25-second promotional ad video for the 'GallerySwipe' app launching tomorrow

scenes.description: Animated text intro displaying 'GallerySwipe' with a sleek entrance animation and background gradient.
Demonstration of a user swiping right and left on photos in the app UI, showing keep/delete actions in real time.
Visual representation of the AI scanning through the photo library, highlighting images with colored outlines and a progress bar.
Show resulting batch delete screen with total space freed and confirmation of deletions.
Call-to-action text: 'Launching Tomorrow! Download GallerySwipe on the App Store.' with final animation.
